statements: DELETE FROM trade_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM trade_data WHERE trade_id = 100 AND symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM trade_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND strategy_name = 'Long Term' AND quantity > 1000;
DELETE FROM strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Long-Term Investment';
DELETE FROM trades WHERE trade_id = 100 AND symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM strategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Long Call' AND performance > 0.5;
DELETE FROM executions WHERE execution_price > 1000 AND strategy_id = 2;
DELETE FROM executions WHERE trade_id = '8c8e67d3-abfb-4d4b-bb32-1292ff3a416e' AND execution_quantity < 100;
DELETE FROM executions WHERE trade_id = 2001 AND execution_price > 50.00;
